autumn/fall/harvest time
surname Qiu
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: This revolutionary historical novel centres in the Autumn Harvest Uprising.

sentences.english: I have a book relating to the Autumn Harvest Uprising.
sentences.chinese: 我有一本關於秋收起義的書。
